title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: John W. Jordan to Orlando Brown, August 31, 1868
summary: Jordan reports that the distrust felt among blacks in Augusta County is a product of the fact that whites do not want to recognize their status as citizens, and because they continued to be taken advantage of in the labor market.
keywords: Community Values/Local Behavior, Legal System, Patriotism, Race Relations, Economy, Employment/Labor, Education, American Civil War
